title: alterra57
author: alterra57
content: Need 1,000 USDT on Polygon. Will send 1,100 USD worth of STORJ as collateral. STORJ: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/storjI will pay 0.5% interest a day, I might pay in 1 day or after a week, waiting on a transaction and don't really know when it will be sent. I'll also cover all transaction fees.Please reply with your STORJ address.

comments.author: Eisenhower34
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on November 23, 2023, 02:24:32 PMNeed 1,000 USDT on Polygon. Will send 1,100 USD worth of STORJ as collateral. STORJ: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/storjI will pay 0.5% interest a day, I might pay in 1 day or after a week, waiting on a transaction and don't really know when it will be sent. I'll also cover all transaction fees.Please reply with your STORJ address.Agreed. My STORJ address. 0xd7D2A4e987597C67dDE32f052096104Ea55D64E5

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Careful OP, look through the forum activity. Post history gaps, password changes.  Not I want to meddle into your business affairs, but just looking out for you. If in doubt, always use an escrow service. I think there's some couple of Bitcointalk members who set up a zero fee escrow service to help members, I just don't remember the thread.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Eisenhower34 on November 24, 2023, 11:55:48 AMQuote from: alterra57 on November 23, 2023, 02:24:32 PMNeed 1,000 USDT on Polygon. Will send 1,100 USD worth of STORJ as collateral. STORJ: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/storjI will pay 0.5% interest a day, I might pay in 1 day or after a week, waiting on a transaction and don't really know when it will be sent. I'll also cover all transaction fees.Please reply with your STORJ address.Agreed. My STORJ address. 0xd7D2A4e987597C67dDE32f052096104Ea55D64E5Thanks but I can't, you just came back from a 3 year break.Quote from: JeromeTash on November 24, 2023, 01:27:04 PMCareful OP, look through the forum activity. Post history gaps, password changes.  Not I want to meddle into your business affairs, but just looking out for you. If in doubt, always use an escrow service. I think there's some couple of Bitcointalk members who set up a zero fee escrow service to help members, I just don't remember the thread.Exactly, I was looking for one of the most reputable lenders but didn't want to post in their threads as it would probably get lost in there. Thanks for the advice.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Interesting the lender needs a loan...Quote from: alterra57 on November 24, 2023, 07:23:58 PMThanks but I can't, you just came back from a 3 year break.Beggars can't be choosers.QuoteExactly, I was looking for one of the most reputable lenders but didn't want to post in their threads as it would probably get lost in there. Thanks for the advice.More like wanting to scam someone or con someone who will give you a positive trust feedback.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Yawn!How's that ban evasion appeal going?Are you gathering funds together with one loan to pay back the other loan?Do tell.

comments.author: alterra57

comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on November 26, 2023, 12:17:17 PMYawn!How's that ban evasion appeal going?Are you gathering funds together with one loan to pay back the other loan?Do tell.I don't know what you're talking about, if you think I'm breaking the rules of this forum you call home please report me at the right section and do not spam my topics with your ramblings. Thank you  Edit, loan granted by zazarb. Topic locked.
